wikipedia_page.main: Robert Lewis "Bob" Cattrall (born 10 October 1957) is a former British field hockey player, who won the bronze medal with the British team at the 1984 Summer Olympics in Los Angeles, California. He was educated at Felsted School. He played his club hockey for Southgate Hockey Club.
